oai_dc:dc.dc:title: 1937: Pedestrians watch rising flood waters at the riverfront
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: 1937 flood; Riverside Drive; Beale Street; newspapers; Mississippi River; riverboats; railroads; pedestrians;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Commercial Appeal newspaper clipping showing pedestrians looking at a flooded Mississippi River. "Chief spot of interest in Memphis yesterday was the riverfront where hundreds gathered to watch the rising waters that already have crawled over the Beale Avenue ramp and blocked traffic on Riverside Drive near the West Kentucky Coal Co."
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Memphis & Shelby County Room Photograph Collection
